Class AppManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.cluster.master.AppManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, akka.actor.Stash, akka.actor.StashSupport, akka.actor.UnrestrictedStash, akka.dispatch.RequiresMessageQueue<akka.dispatch.DequeBasedMessageQueueSemantics>, TimeOutScheduler

    public class AppManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Actor, akka.actor.Stash, TimeOutScheduler
    AppManager is dedicated child of Master to manager all applications.
